languages.text: {n}Джай с мрачной ухмылкой поворачивается к вам.{/n} "Да уж, шерин... Нам надо то ли праздновать победу, то ли поминки по себе устраивать. В любом случае — надо как следует напиться. Предлагаю не откладывать и прямо сейчас направиться в наше укрытие, в логово Ревущих".

{n}Jae turns to you with a grim smile on her face.{/n} "Well, shereen... I don't know if we should be celebrating our victory or our final moments. One way or another, we'd better get sloshed. No time like the present — let's head straight to our hideout at the Shriekers' den."
languages.original_text: {n}Джай с мрачной ухмылкой поворачивается к вам.{/n} "Да уж, шерин... Нам надо то ли праздновать победу, то ли поминки по себе устраивать. В любом случае — надо как следует напиться. Предлагаю не откладывать и прямо сейчас направиться в наше укрытие, в логово Ревущих".

traits.locale_text: {n}Jae turns to you with a grim smile on her face.{/n} "Well, shereen... I don't know if we should be celebrating our victory or our final moments. One way or another, we'd better get sloshed. Let's not hold off on that and head straight to our hideout at the Shriekers' den."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: {n}ジェイは不機嫌そうな笑みを浮かべてこちらに向き直る。{/n}「そうね、シェリーン…勝利を祝うべきなのか、それとも最後の瞬間を祝うべきなのかわからない。どっちにしたってパーッと飲みたいね。大事なのは今この時。とりあえずシュリーカーズのアジトに直行しようじゃないの」
languages.original_text: {n}Jae turns to you with a grim smile on her face.{/n} "Well, shereen... I don't know if we should be celebrating our victory or our final moments. One way or another, we'd better get sloshed. No time like the present — let's head straight to our hideout at the Shriekers' den."

traits.locale_text: {n}ジェイは不機嫌そうな笑みを浮かべてこちらに向き直る。{/n}「そうね、ダーリン…勝利を祝うべきなのか、それとも最後の瞬間を祝うべきなのかわからない。どっちにしたってパーッと飲みたいね。とりあえずシュリーカーズのアジトに直行しようじゃないの」
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: {n}婕伊转向你，脸上带着严峻的微笑。{/n}“嗯，亲爱的……我不知道是该庆祝这场胜利，还是应该庆祝我们最后的日子。不管怎么说，咱们还是去喝个烂醉吧。这种时候真是再适合不过了，咱们立刻回到尖啸者的藏身处吧。”
languages.original_text: {n}Jae turns to you with a grim smile on her face.{/n} "Well, shereen... I don't know if we should be celebrating our victory or our final moments. One way or another, we'd better get sloshed. No time like the present — let's head straight to our hideout at the Shriekers' den."

traits.locale_text: {n}婕伊转向你，脸上带着严峻的微笑。{/n}“嗯，亲爱的……我不知道是该庆祝这场胜利，还是应该庆祝我们最后的日子。不管怎么说，咱们还是去喝个烂醉吧。别再拖延了，咱们立刻回到尖啸者的藏身处吧。”
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: {n}Jae se vuelve hacia ti con una sonrisa sombría en su rostro.{/n} «Bueno, shereen... No sé si deberíamos celebrar nuestra victoria o nuestros últimos momentos. De un modo u otro, será mejor que nos emborrachemos. Hay que aprovechar el presente: vayamos a nuestro escondite en la guarida de los Aulladores».
languages.original_text: {n}Jae turns to you with a grim smile on her face.{/n} "Well, shereen... I don't know if we should be celebrating our victory or our final moments. One way or another, we'd better get sloshed. No time like the present — let's head straight to our hideout at the Shriekers' den."

traits.locale_text: {n}Jae se vuelve hacia ti con una sonrisa sombría en su rostro.{/n} «Bueno, shereen... No sé si deberíamos celebrar nuestra victoria o nuestros últimos momentos. De un modo u otro, será mejor que nos emborrachemos. No esperemos más y vayamos a nuestro escondite en la guarida de los Aulladores».
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: {n}Jae wendet sich mit einem finsteren Lächeln auf dem Gesicht zu dir.{/n} "Nun, Shereen ... Ich weiß nicht, ob wir unseren Sieg oder unsere letzten Augenblicke feiern sollten. Auf jeden Fall müssen wir uns tüchtig betrinken. Jetzt oder nie ... gehen wir direkt in unser Versteck bei dein Kreischern."
languages.original_text: {n}Jae turns to you with a grim smile on her face.{/n} "Well, shereen... I don't know if we should be celebrating our victory or our final moments. One way or another, we'd better get sloshed. No time like the present — let's head straight to our hideout at the Shriekers' den."

traits.locale_text: {n}Jae wendet sich mit einem finsteren Lächeln auf dem Gesicht zu dir.{/n} "Nun, Shereen ... Ich weiß nicht, ob wir unseren Sieg oder unsere letzten Augenblicke feiern sollten. Auf jeden Fall müssen wir uns tüchtig betrinken. Schieben wir das nicht auf die lange Bank, gehen wir direkt in unser Versteck bei dein Kreischern."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: {n}Jae se tourne vers vous avec un sourire sinistre.{/n} « Eh bien, shereen... Je ne sais pas s'il nous faut célébrer notre victoire ou nos derniers instants, mais pour l'un comme pour l'autre, autant se bourrer la gueule. Et autant le faire tout de suite, alors retournons vite au repaire des Hurleurs. »
languages.original_text: {n}Jae turns to you with a grim smile on her face.{/n} "Well, shereen... I don't know if we should be celebrating our victory or our final moments. One way or another, we'd better get sloshed. No time like the present — let's head straight to our hideout at the Shriekers' den."

traits.locale_text: {n}Jae se tourne vers vous avec un sourire sinistre.{/n} « Eh bien, shereen... Je ne sais pas s'il nous faut célébrer notre victoire ou nos derniers instants, mais pour l'un comme pour l'autre, autant se bourrer la gueule. Et autant le faire tout de suite, alors retournons vite au repaire des Hurleurs. »
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: {n}Jae, nahoş bir gülümsemeyle sana dönüyor.{/n} "Ee şirinim... Zaferimizi mi kutlamalıyız yoksa ölümümüzü mü? Ne olursa olsun bence gidip kafayı bulmalıyız. Kalan anlarımızı da güzelce geçirmek lazım, direkt Çığırtkanların inindeki sığınağımıza gidelim."
languages.original_text: {n}Jae turns to you with a grim smile on her face.{/n} "Well, shereen... I don't know if we should be celebrating our victory or our final moments. One way or another, we'd better get sloshed. No time like the present — let's head straight to our hideout at the Shriekers' den."

traits.locale_text: {n}Jae nahoş bir gülümsemeyle sana dönüyor.{/n} "Ee şirinim... Zaferimizi mi kutlamalıyız yoksa son anlarımızı mı, emin değilim. Ne olursa olsun bence gidip kafayı bulmalıyız. Mutlulukları ertelememek lazım, direkt Çığırtkanların inindeki sığınağımıza gidelim."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion
